page.title: 18RECREATION, SPETCHLEY AREA
page.content: {COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES:}In the village hall which is the former Catholic primary school the{Gardening club meets.The hall committee meets to plan special events.There is no{W.I. in the area but ladies attend the {Churchwomen's Fellowship}at White Ladies Aston. {Church services}are attended by people from outside the parish and are cohesive to community life. There are no hotels or restaurants but bar snacks are available at the {Berkeley Knot}pub.Many seek their entertainment in Worcester city. {Footpaths and bridleways}criss-cross the whole area and provide a chance to see the many species of wildlife, such as deer,foxes,badger,mink, hares, lizards, wildfowl and butterflies. {A mobile library}arrives for ten minutes, once a month!
